delete.desc: Deletes the specified private endpoint connection associated with the key vault.

200.desc: The private endpoint connection was successfully deleted.

202.desc: The private endpoint connection is being deleted.

Retry-After.desc: The recommended number of seconds to wait before calling the URI specified in the location header.

Location.desc: The URI to poll for completion status.

204.desc: The private endpoint connection does not exist.

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.
